verses.verse: I beg<WG3870> you<WG5209> therefore<WG3767>, brothers<WG80>, by<WG1223> the mercies<WG3628> of God<WG2316>, that you present<WG3936> your<WG5216> bodies<WG4983> a<WG2378> living<WG2198> sacrifice<WG2378>, holy<WG40>, acceptable<WG2101> unto God<WG2316>, which is your<WG5216> reasonable<WG3050> service<WG2999>.

And<WG2532> be<WG4964> not<WG3361> conformed<WG4964> to<WG165> this<WG5129> world<WG165>: but<WG235> be you transformed<WG3339> by the renewing<WG342> of<WG3563> your<WG5216> mind<WG3563>, that<WG1519> you<WG5209> may prove<WG1381> what<WG5101> is that<WG2307> good<WG18>, and<WG2532> acceptable<WG2101>, and<WG2532> perfect<WG5046>, will<WG2307> of God<WG2316>.

For<WG1063> I say<WG3004>, through<WG1223> the grace<WG5485> given<WG1325> unto me<WG3427>, to every man<WG3956> that is<WG5607> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, not<WG3361> to think<WG5252> of himself more highly<WG5252> than<WG3844> he ought<WG1163> to think<WG5426>; but<WG235> to think<WG5426><WG99999> soberly<WG4993>, according as<WG5613> God<WG2316> has dealt<WG3307> to every man<WG1538> the measure<WG3358> of faith<WG4102>.

For<WG1063> as<WG2509> we have<WG2192> many<WG4183> members<WG3196> in<WG1722> one<WG1520> body<WG4983>, and<WG1161> all<WG3956> members<WG3196> have<WG2192> not<WG3756> the<WG4234> same<WG846> function<WG4234>:
So<WG3779> we<WG2070>, being many<WG4183>, are<WG2070> one<WG1520> body<WG4983> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG1161> every<WG2596> one<WG1520> members<WG3196> one of another<WG240>.

Having<WG2192> then<WG1161> gifts<WG5486> differing<WG1313> according to<WG2596> the grace<WG5485> that is given<WG1325> to us<WG2254>, whether<WG1535> prophecy<WG4394>, let us prophesy according to<WG2596> the proportion<WG356> of faith<WG4102>;
Or<WG1535> ministry<WG1248>, let us give ourselves to<WG1722> our ministering<WG1248>: or<WG1535> he that teaches<WG1321>, to<WG1722> his teaching<WG1319>;

Or<WG1535> he that exhorts<WG3870>, to<WG1722> exhortation<WG3874>: he that gives<WG3330>, let him do it with<WG1722> simplicity<WG572>; he that rules<WG4291>, with<WG1722> diligence<WG4710>; he that shows mercy<WG1653>, with<WG1722> cheerfulness<WG2432>.
Let love<WG26><WG99999> be without hypocrisy<WG505>. Abhor<WG655> that which is evil<WG4190>; cleave<WG2853> to that which is good<WG18>.
Be kindly affectionate<WG5387> one<WG240> to<WG1519> another<WG240> with brotherly love<WG5360>; in honor<WG5092> preferring<WG4285> one another<WG240>;
Not<WG3361> lagging<WG3636> in diligence<WG4710>; fervent<WG2204> in spirit<WG4151>; serving<WG1398> the Lord<WG2962>;
Rejoicing<WG5463> in hope<WG1680>; patient<WG5278> in tribulation<WG2347>; continuing steadfastly<WG4342> in prayer<WG4335>;
Distributing<WG2841> to the necessity<WG5532> of saints<WG40>; given to<WG1377> hospitality<WG5381>.
Bless<WG2127> them which persecute<WG1377> you<WG5209>: bless<WG2127>, and<WG2532> curse<WG2672> not<WG3361>.
Rejoice<WG5463> with<WG3326> them that rejoice<WG5463>, and<WG2532> weep<WG2799> with<WG3326> them that weep<WG2799>.

Be of<WG5426> the same<WG846> mind<WG5426> one<WG240> toward<WG1519> another<WG240>. Don<WG3361>'t set your mind<WG5426> on high things<WG5308>, but<WG235> associate<WG4879> with humble<WG5011> men<WG1096>. Be not<WG3361> wise<WG5429> in<WG3844> your own conceits<WG1438>.
Recompense<WG591> to no man<WG3367> evil<WG2556> for<WG473> evil<WG2556>. Provide<WG4306> things honest<WG2570> in the sight of<WG1799> all<WG3956> men<WG444>.
If<WG1487> it is possible<WG1415>, as much as lies in<WG1537> you<WG5216>, live peaceably<WG1514> with<WG3326> all<WG3956> men<WG444>.

Dearly beloved<WG27>, avenge<WG1556> not<WG3361> yourselves<WG1438>, but<WG235> rather give<WG1325> place<WG5117> to God<WG3709>'s wrath: for<WG1063> it is written<WG1125>, Vengeance<WG1557> is mine<WG1698>; I<WG1473> will repay<WG467>, says<WG3004> the Lord<WG2962>.

Therefore<WG3767> if<WG1437> your<WG4675> enemy<WG2190> hungers<WG3983>, feed<WG5595> him<WG846>; if<WG1437> he thirsts<WG1372>, give<WG4222> him<WG846> drink<WG4222>: for<WG1063> in so<WG5124> doing<WG4160> you shall heap<WG4987> coals<WG440> of fire<WG4442> on<WG1909> his<WG846> head<WG2776>.
Be<WG3528> not<WG3361> overcome<WG3528> by<WG5259> evil<WG2556>, but<WG235> overcome<WG3528> evil<WG2556> with<WG1722> good<WG18>.
